sentences.en: A person or thing of unsurpassed excellence or beauty; a paragon.
sentences.cn: 殊品,完人,绝代佳人卓越无比的完美事物或美人; 完人.

sentences.en: An ordinary mind is a mind of utmost freedom and unsurpassed joy.
sentences.cn: 24平常心就是最自在、最愉快的心.

sentences.en: Animal and plant life are abundant, and the scenery is unsurpassed.
sentences.cn: 这里的动物和植物种类繁多, 景色美不胜收.

sentences.en: Covance's ongoing success offers team members unsurpassed growth and career development opportunities.
sentences.cn: 科文斯的不断成功为团队成员提供了良好的成长和职业发展机会.

sentences.en: His mind was keen, and his will to work was unsurpassed.
sentences.cn: 他头脑敏捷, 工作意识无人可比.

sentences.en: I'm sure the freshness and sweetness of my fruits are unsurpassed.
sentences.cn: 我相信它们的新鲜度与甜度是无人可比的.

sentences.en: In another literary form, poetry, the Bible is unsurpassed.
sentences.cn: 在另一种文学形式即诗歌方面, 《圣经》是无与伦比的.

sentences.en: It provides the unsurpassed couple and the safest transportation.
sentences.cn: 它提供了无与伦比的夫妇和最安全的交通工具.

sentences.en: My country is blessed with unsurpassed natural resources.
sentences.cn: 我国有得天独厚的自然资源.

sentences.en: Queen Elizabeth II of Britain has an unsurpassed collection of Canalellos.
sentences.cn: 英国女王伊丽莎白二世收集了许多卡纳莱托的风景画,无人可及.

sentences.en: The green of this English country is unsurpassed.
sentences.cn: 英国这个农村的绿色是举世绝伦的.

sentences.en: The quality of Smallbone furniture is unsurpassed.
sentences.cn: 斯莫尔本恩家具品质超凡。

sentences.en: They claim to have perfected unsurpassed Bodhi uttering a great lie.
sentences.cn: 自言满足无上菩提.大妄语成.

sentences.en: They composed and sang epic poems of unsurpassed beauty and insight.
sentences.cn: 他们创作并演唱史诗,其优美和深刻无与伦比.

sentences.en: They showed unsurpassed bravery in battle.
sentences.cn: 在战斗中他们表现得无比英勇.

trans.tran_cn: 未被凌驾的，非常卓越的，绝伦
